title: Chandrika Diamond Haaram with Emerald Accents
features: This Chandrika Haaram, a stunning collar necklace, features a unique geometric design meticulously studded with dazzling cubic zirconia. Emerald floral motifs are placed strategically for added elegance. A crescent-shaped pendant, adorned with CZ stones and Hyderabadi Pearl drops, adds a touch of traditional charm. The necklace incorporates a captivating Jhumka pendant suspended within the crescent, enhancing its visual appeal.
occasions: and other grand occasions. Also suitable for modern celebrations where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: This Chandrika Haaram is a statement piece that effortlessly blends traditional South Indian design with contemporary aesthetics. The intricate CZ work and Emerald accents create a captivating sparkle, while the Hyderabadi Pearl drops add a touch of grace. Its exquisite craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty and value.
